I'm with - first I've seen of this as well. And I dont recall anyone saying anything about a sign. 
On Jul 27, 2020 7:30 AM, ' 
. (OIG)" •ciMIMS> 
wrote: 
That is the first I am seeing that sign. I will check the 302s and MOls to see if this was brought up. 
U.S. Department of Justice 
Office of the Inspector General 
New York Field Office 
One Battery Park Plaza, 29th Floor 
New York, NY 10004 
(Office) 
(Cell Phone) 
From: (USANYS) < 
Sent: Sunday, July 26, 2020 11:11 PM 
To: (NY) (OGA) (FBI) < 
(OIG) <dcarpenter@0IG USD0J G0V> 
(USAWS) c=.
> 
Cc: 
Subject: Sign in SHU 
Hi folks, 
. (NY) (FBI) <
M>; 
I have a recollection that when we were interviewing employees at the MCC, one or more individuals told us there was 
a sign posted in the SHU that said to do your checks on Epstein. If memory serves, we never recovered the document. 
But last week we got a production of records from the BOP as part of FOIA litigation that included the attached. Can 
you remind us (a) if there was in fact some employee who told us about this sign — I haven't looked at all the 302s and 
MOls, and (b) of anything we did to try to get this sign previously (if we did in fact make inquiries). 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
United States Attorney's Office 
Southern District of New York 
One St. Andrew's Plaza 
New 
York, New York 10007 
Tel: 
Cell: 
EFTA00025442
